title: Valhalla eSports, professional gaming organisation looking to fill League of Legends roster.

embed.description: Valhalla Esports is a multi-gaming eSports Team.

body:
Valhalla eSports is a professional multi-game eSports organisation and we are currently seeking Diamond 1+ players  to field on a professional level team.

We strongly believe in the players being the stars here, not the organisation. Let's climb to the top together!

Positions available: Top

Must be 17+ in order to comply with the Riot ruling in regards to LAN events.
Must be non toxic.
Must be able to take direction from coach and teammates. 

Only serious applicants please.

Age:
Availability:
Rank (Peak/Current): /
Role:
Tournament History:
Working Mic:
Skype /TS3:
Reasons to Join the team:
Previous Teams (If any):

Please contact me directly via email and thank you for taking the time to read this.

erebus@valhallaesports.com

replies.body:
I made it to masters in starcraft within a year.

Can't stay out of bronze in 3 years.

I already emailed you, but if you need a spare trialer anytime then I am always available and can comfortably play any role in-depth.
define professional becuase we dont have a league for league(lel) yet
Actually we do, the OPL. Oceanic Pro League
didnt know that was even a thing oh well.
